title: #455 The Most Texas Podcast Of All Time with Joe Rogan and Tony Hinchcliffe
itunes:title: The Most Texas Podcast Of All Time with Joe Rogan and Tony Hinchcliffe
description:
Liberal mouthpiece Joe Rogan, and I guess heterosexual comedian Tony Hinchcliffe met me at a gun range in Texas to shoot the poop and tell stories about the past while Tony caressed his new girlfriend. We took some questions from my Patreon to keep us going while listening to the manly sounds of murder tools going off in the distance.

Both Tony and Joe are about to get that Skeptic Tank bump! So look for them to breakthrough on the scene in the near future. This was actually supposed to be just me and Tony on this one but Joe showed up and we figured it’d be nice to at least have one gram of testosterone on the pod. 

For more Ari: 

Subscribe on YouTube 

Listen to Skeptic Tank

Join Ari's Patreon 

Shop Merch 

Follow Ari on Instagram - @arishaffir

For more Tony:

Twitter - @TonyHinchcliffe

 

The Music:

Ray Wylie Hubbard - Screw You We’re From Texas

Gene Autrey - Deep in the Heart of Texas

Nina Simone - Please Don’t Let Me Be Misunderstood

Nico Vega - The Beast

Nikki Glaser - Bob 

 

Thank you to our sponsor! Head to 3Chi.com and use new promo code "Ari" at checkout for 5% off your order!
